# Sprint Summary - Nossal Intranet

## âœ… All Sprint Issues Created

All 9 sprint issues have been created in the GitHub repository:
https://github.com/tknhs-it/Intranet/issues

## Sprint Overview

### Phase 1: V1 Foundation (Sprints 1-4)
**Goal**: Complete Daily Operating System

- **Sprint 1**: V1 Foundation - Infrastructure & Auth (2 weeks)
- **Sprint 2**: V1 Dashboard - Daily Operating System (2 weeks)  
- **Sprint 3**: V1 Staff Directory - Teams & Presence (1.5 weeks)
- **Sprint 4**: V1 Polish & Testing (1.5 weeks)

**Total**: 7 weeks

### Phase 2: V2 Features (Sprints 5-7)
**Goal**: High-value features

- **Sprint 5**: V2 Room & Equipment Booking (2 weeks)
- **Sprint 6**: V2 PD Hub (2 weeks)
- **Sprint 7**: V2 Onboarding Hub (1.5 weeks)

**Total**: 5.5 weeks

### Phase 3: V3 Features (Sprints 8-9)
**Goal**: Analytics and student portal

- **Sprint 8**: V3 Analytics Dashboard (2 weeks)
- **Sprint 9**: V3 Student Portal (3 weeks, optional)

**Total**: 5 weeks

## Milestones

All milestones have been created with due dates:
- Sprint 1: Due 2025-12-25

- Sprint 8: Due 2026-03-23
- Sprint 9: Due 2026-04-13

## Labels

Labels have been created for:
- Sprint identifiers: `sprint-1` through `sprint-9`
- Feature priorities: `v1`, `v2`, `v3`
- Feature types: `infrastructure`, `dashboard`, `staff-directory`, `testing`, `polish`, `room-booking`, `pd-hub`, `onboarding`, `analytics`, `student-portal`

## Next Steps

1. Review issues in GitHub: https://github.com/tknhs-it/Intranet/issues
2. Assign team members to issues
3. Break down large tasks into smaller sub-issues if needed
4. Start Sprint 1 when ready
5. Track progress using GitHub Projects board

## Viewing Issues

```bash
# List all issues
gh issue list

# List by milestone
gh issue list --milestone "Sprint 1"

# List by label
gh issue list --label "v1"

# View specific issue
gh issue view <number>
```

## Project Board

Consider creating a GitHub Project board to track sprint progress:
- To Do
- In Progress
- In Review
- Done
